tool_description: Detailed 9GAG API. Scraping posts, categories, users. Includes download videos/photos.
name: 9GAG API (Detailed)
title: 9GAG API (Detailed)

api_list.name: Get Pages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://9gag-api-detailed.p.rapidapi.com/get_pages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "9gag-api-detailed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Posts

optional_parameters.name: counter
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

api_list.name: Get User Profile
Get Post Data (Download Video/Photo)
api_list.description: Returns post data. Includes download link for videos.

api_list.name: Get Posts From Page

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Supports categories returned from the /get_pages endpoint

optional_parameters.name: counter
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

api_list.name: Get Posts From Category
api_list.description: Returns post from specific category. Uses cursor as **after** parameter.

optional_parameters.name: counter
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: leave blank for first request. For subsequent requests, send the counter and after parameter you got from the previous request.

api_list.name: Get Post Comments

optional_parameters.name: next
optional_parameters.description: To get the **next **data, leave the** nex**t parameter*** blank***. then send the next data in the incoming response as the next parameter and increase the count amount by 10. You can also pull other comments by doing it constantly.
